group_1.textLeft: Sorry, Emirin...@Looks like you did all that work for nothing.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I picked some real duds this time, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Nah, it's fine!@Maybe I wasn't into it this time.

group_1.textRight: (What would being "into" mixers@even look like...?)

group_1.textLeft: I guess, nothing good comes out@of desperation...

group_1.textRight: Desperation? What're you talking about?

group_1.textLeft: We're in the same boat, Senpai.@We both have had our hearts broken!

group_1.textRight: Really? You don't seem like you'd have@[chara:300301:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json]any trouble getting attention, tho—
Wait a second! Emiri![chara:300301:cheek_1:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]
You told her I got my heart broken?!
What?@Was I not supposed to?
You have THE BIGGEST MOUTH[chara:300301:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger] of @anyone I've ever met!
So you got your heart broken!@That's like nothing to be ashamed of!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! You asked him out!@You're so cool for doing that!

group_1.textRight: Say what?

group_1.textLeft: I didn't even get a chance to@ask out my crush…
No, "Wanna go out?" No, nothing. So lame.

group_1.textRight: That's...not...true!
Wait, Rikki!@You should totally just wish it to be!
Like, basically...
You can join Myako-senpai@and me and be a Magical Girl!
Wh-wh-what?![chara:300301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]@[chara:300301:cheek_1]You're not supposed to―
Yep! If you become one of us, [chara:300601:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json]you can@literally, like, make your dream come true!
Well, not for free, but...
I mean, there's like a teeny-tiny bit@of ghost hunting you have to do.[chara:300601:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json]

group_1.textLeft: What're you talking about?@A game or something?

group_1.textRight: No way, girlfriend! It's totes real!
Whoa, whoa, whoa... Emiri!
Being honest is one thing, but.... There're@some things you shouldn't talk about.
Take it easy, she's not a Magical Girl yet!
Look girl, she's got her eye on@someone, right?
Well, this is her best shot at making@him hers!
Oh, give me a break!

group_1.textLeft: You said it could make my dream come true...
What if my dream means changing how@someone else feels? Would it still come true?

group_1.textRight: Totally!@You can have whatever you want, babe!
Don't do it.
Rika, even if you get a chance to become a@Magical Girl...
There's only one piece of advice I can give you...
Don't do it.
Emiri and I...
We've already become Magical Girls,@so it's too late for us, but...
You can make that dream a reality@without becoming a Magical Girl...
...you're better off not doing it.@It's really cruddy being one of us.
What, it's not all that bad.
Sure is.
You're getting a chance to ask for something@that could never actually come true, right?
How big of a price do you think@you'll have to pay for something like that?
Think long and hard about what I just said.
